full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Competitive RFP for Office Furniture 

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Shared Services Canada (SSC), is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of Category 6 office furniture, more specifically, Workspaces, under Standing Offer Imperial P.Q. 140003 (SA E60PQ-140003) at the Longueuil, Quebec, Canada site.

#### Call for Proposals

PWGSC invites bids for the acquisition of office furniture that meet the requirements outlined in Annex A of the attached Contract clause. Submissions must be received by 14:00 HNE on January 18, 2023. Proposals received after this time will be deemed non-responsive.

#### RFP Details
| Property | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Contract Reference Number | WS3780960312 |
| Solicitation Number | WS3780960312 |
| Amendments | 2 |
| Tender Closing Date | January 18, 2023, 14:00 HNE |
| Expected Contract Start Date | Not Specified |
| Expected Contract End Date | Not Specified |
| Status | Expiré |
| UNSPSC | 56101700 (Office Furniture) |
| Procurement Category | Government Department (GD) |

#### Important Documents

- Contract Award Clause
- Annex A
- Procurement Notice

#### Submission Requirements

To be considered, bids must be submitted electronically to the specified contact by the deadline. Late submissions will not be accepted.

#### Contact Information
Julien, Lisa-Marie (TSPGC/PSPC)
Email: [lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Acknowledgement
The call for proposals is issued under the terms of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Sub-mission all necessary supporting documentation and bid submissions for close to 14:00 HNE on the specified date.
